mail.name: personnalQuotationOrder
mail.subject: 人工报价订单
mail.content:
订单基本信息
创建时间：${create_time}
订单号：${code}
语言对:${s_language_name}- ${t_language_name}
价位:${level}
领域:${industry_name}
备注:${description}
客户:${email}
mail.sql: SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time,o.code,a.language_name as s_language_name,b.language_name as t_language_name,pl.level,i.industry_name,d.description,u.email FROM `order_temp` o INNER JOIN `dict_language_pair` p ON o.pair_id = p.pair_id AND o.code = '#{order_id}' LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_language` a ON a.language_id = p.source_lang LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_language` b ON b.language_id = p.target_lang LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_price_level` pl ON pl.price_level_id = o.price_level_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_industry` i ON i.industry_id = o.industry_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_description` d ON d.order_id = o.order_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id = o.customer_id LIMIT 1;

mail.name: userPayment
mail.subject: 新订单${code}-已付款${total_money} ${currency}
mail.content:
订单基本信息
创建时间：${create_time}
订单号：${code}
语言对:${s_language_name} - ${t_language_name}
字数:${word_count}
价位:${level}
订单金额：${total_money} ${currency}
支付方式：${payment_type}
领域:${industry_name}
备注:${description}
客户:${email}
T预计交付时间：${expected_delivery_time_t}
E预计交付时间：${expected_delivery_time_e}
mail.sql: SELECT IF(o.create_time = 0,'',FROM_UNIXTIME(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) as create_time, o.code,a.language_name as s_language_name,b.language_name as t_language_name,o.word_count,pl.level,o.total_money,i.industry_name,d.description,u.email, IF(o.expected_delivery_time_t = 0,'',FROM_UNIXTIME(o.expected_delivery_time_t,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) as expected_delivery_time_t, IF(o.expected_delivery_time_e = 0,'',FROM_UNIXTIME(o.expected_delivery_time_e,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) as expected_delivery_time_e, CASE WHEN currency_id = 1 THEN 'CNY' WHEN currency_id = 2 THEN 'USD' WHEN currency_id =3 THEN 'EUR' ELSE concat(currency_id,'CNY') END AS currency, CASE WHEN o.payment_type =1 THEN '支付宝' WHEN o.payment_type = 2 THEN '银联在线' WHEN o.payment_type = 3 THEN '离线支付' WHEN o.payment_type = 4 THEN '预付款' WHEN o.payment_type = 5 THEN '预付款+支付宝' WHEN o.payment_type = 6 THEN '预付款+银联在线' WHEN o.payment_type = 7 THEN '预付款+离线支付' ELSE concat(o.payment_type,'') END AS payment_type FROM `order` o INNER JOIN `dict_language_pair` p ON o.pair_id = p.pair_id AND o.order_id = #{order_id} LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_language` a ON a.language_id = p.source_lang LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_language` b ON b.language_id = p.target_lang LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_price_level` pl ON pl.price_level_id = o.price_level_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `dict_industry` i ON i.industry_id = o.industry_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_description` d ON d.order_id = o.order_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id = o.customer_id LIMIT 1;
